attributes.action: abandon proposal to premanantely close and bulldoze the Grange High Schol In Runcorn, Cheshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This school has won various art awards, has a fantastic special needs department. Susan Nickson who is the writer of Two Pints Of Lager And A Packet Of Chrisp attended The Grange High School so is a local historic land mark and closing the school would add to the problem of lack of school places.
